data.fullContent: Free-writing is a form of writing activity that forces you to put down your best thoughts and feelings without thinking about grammar, spelling, organization, or order. It can come in handy at times when you don't have time to edit your work for errors. Say you have a writing assignment that is due tomorrow, but you haven't finished yet. Free-writing can help you put down your best thoughts on paper. It can also be used to explore your creativity, improve your writing technique, or discover a role or interest that may lead you to a potential career path.

q1.translation: 自由写作是一种写作活动，迫使你写下自己最好的想法和感受，而不考虑语法、拼写、组织或顺序。它可以在你没有时间编辑你的工作错误的时候派上用场。
q1.front: Free-writing is a form of writing activity that forces you to put down your best thoughts and feelings without thinking about grammar, spelling, organization, or order. It can come in handy at times when you don't have time to edit your work for errors.

q2.translation: 自由写作是一种写作活动，迫使你写下自己最好的想法和感受，而不考虑语法、拼写、组织或顺序。它可以在你没有时间编辑你的工作错误的时候派上用场。假设你明天要交一份写作作业，但是你还没有完成。自由写作可以帮助你把最好的想法写在纸上。它也可以用来探索你的创造力，提高你的写作技巧，或发现一个角色或兴趣，可能会引导你走向潜在的职业道路。

q2.ending: Free-writing can help you put down your best thoughts on paper. It can also be used to explore your creativity, improve your writing technique, or discover a role or interest that may lead you to a potential career path.
